mapper.select: SELECT EMP_CODE, DEPT_CODE, POSITION_CODE, PASSWORD, EMP_NAME, PHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, BIRTHDAY_DATE, JOIN_DATE, SIGN_FILE_NAME, PASSWORD_MODIFY_DATETIME, STATUS_CODE, LEAVE_DATE FROM EMP_T WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode} AND PASSWORD = #{pw}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMP_T WHERE STATUS_CODE IN ('s01', 's02')

SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, P.POSITION_NAME, E.MOBILE, E.EMAIL, E.STATUS_CODE FROM EMP_T E LEFT JOIN DEPT_T D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE WHERE STATUS_CODE IN ('s01', 's02') ORDER BY EMP_CODE ASC

SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.EMP_NAME, E.PASSWORD, E.BIRTHDAY_DATE, E.JOIN_DATE, D.DEPT_NAME, P.POSITION_NAME, E.PROFILE_FILE_NAME, E.ZIP_CODE, E.ADDRESS, E.DETAIL_ADDRESS, E.MOBILE, E.EMAIL FROM EMP_T E LEFT JOIN DEPT_T D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE WHERE E.EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP_T SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_CODE = #{empCode}, POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode}, MOBILE = #{mobile}, EMAIL = #{email}, BIRTHDAY_DATE = #{birthdayDate}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode}, ADDRESS = #{address}, DETAIL_ADDRESS = #{detailAddress} WHERE EMP_CODE= #{empCode}
UPDATE EMP_T SET STATUS_CODE = 's03', LEAVE_DATE = CURRENT_DATE WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
mapper.select: SELECT D.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_CODE, D.DEPT_LEADER_EMP_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMP_T E WHERE D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_HEADCOUNT, DEPT_CREATEDATE FROM DEPT_T D;
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP_T SET SIGN_FILE_NAME = #{signFileName} WHERE EMP_CODE = #{empCode}
UPDATE EMP_T SET PHONE = #{phone}, MOBILE = #{mobile}, EMAIL = #{email}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode}, ADDRESS = #{address}, DETAIL_ADDRESS = #{detailAddress} WHERE EMP_CODE= #{empCode}
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_T.EMP_CODE, EMP_T.EMP_NAME, DEPT_T.DEPT_NAME, POSITION_T.POSITION_NAME, EMP_T.MOBILE, EMP_T.STATUS_CODE, EMP_T.LEAVE_DATE FROM EMP_T INNER JOIN DEPT_T ON EMP_T.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_T.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN POSITION_T ON EMP_T.POSITION_CODE = POSITION_T.POSITION_CODE WHERE STATUS_CODE = 's03' ORDER BY LEAVE_DATE DESC
